findings.title: Owner can change tax and liquidity fees
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify tax and liquidity fees.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or users from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change marketingDivisor
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing divisor.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum number of tokens to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum number of tokens required to add to liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can change buyBackUpperLimit
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the buyBackUpperLimit, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the marketing address which could lead to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Owner can enable and disable buyBack
findings.description: The owner has privileges to enable and disable buyBack functionality.

findings.title: Owner can enable before and after presale modes
findings.description: The owner has privileges to enable or disable presale modes, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.

findings.title: Owner can blacklist and unblacklist addresses
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to blacklist and unblacklist addresses, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected functions
findings.description: The following functions are unprotected: reflectionFromToken, tokenFromReflection, excludeFromReward, includeInReward, _approve, _transfer, swapTokens, buyBackTokens, swapTokensForEth, swapETHForTokens, addLiquidity, _tokenTransfer, _transferStandard, _transferToExcluded, _transferFromExcluded, _transferBothExcluded, _reflectFee, _getValues, _getTValues, _getRValues, _getRate, _getCurrentSupply, _takeLiquidity, calculateTaxFee, removeAllFee, restoreAllFee
